translations: 完美主义者（perfectionist 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: General product quality is also a major driver - we are perfectionists.
sentences.translation: 整体产品质量也是主要的考虑因素——我们是完美主义者。

sentences.sentence: "Perfectionists tend to believe that everything is equally important," notes Szymanski.
sentences.translation: 西曼斯基强调：“完美主义者通常认为所有任务都同等重要。”
